title: The Meat Man

description:
Some things you can't unsee...

***

Written by: Erutious

***

Bonus Episode: "The Bridge" written by: Keith LaFountaine and Narrated by: Jimmy Ferrer

***

Content Warning: Suicide, Child violence

***

Find our reward tiers and how to get your bonus magnet at patreon.com/creepypod

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/creepypod
